title: Jimmy G Mega-Extension, Issues With The Hall Of Fame (Football 02/09)
description:
Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora breakdown Jimmy Garoppolo's contract extension and whether the 49ers faltered with the deal or the timing of it. The guys also further discuss Josh McDaniels return to New England and what's next for the Colts. Finally, Pete laments against the Hall of Fame selection process and offers a few suggestions to change HoF voting.
